name: ytivarG
description:
I made this for the Interstellar Game Jam 3 using pico8. The jam lasted 5 days, although I only worked on it for 3 (I started a day late and there is a day left as of writing this).

The theme was "defy the laws" so in this game gravity pushes instead of pulls!

There are some audio problems (worse in the browser I believe), and in the browser it lags every so often.

Try to play a downloadable version if you want to review the game! :)

Not much else to say! (except the game is pretty hard)
